Logan.Nora Eccles Harrison Museum of Art: The Nora Eccles Harrison Museum of Art (NEHMA) is an accredited academic art museum focused on modern and contemporary art at Utah State University in Logan, Utah. NEHMA was founded in 1982 with the ceramic collection of philanthropist and namesake Nora Eccles Harrison. The Museum has since expanded to include over 5,500 objects focused on modernist and contemporary works created in the western region of the United States.
